gen:link.msg:message: `AccuracyAndCompletenessOfTheHomeAllocation` MUST NOT be reported, because the reported value of `AgreementsConcludedWithThirdParties` is equal to `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AccountabilityComplianceWithSpecificLegalProvisionsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovU11_AgreementsConcludedWithThirdParties')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AccountabilityComplianceWithSpecificLegalProvisionsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovU11_AgreementsConcludedWithThirdParties return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AccountabilityComplianceWithSpecificLegalProvisionsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovU11_AccuracyAndCompletenessOfTheHomeAllocation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AccountabilityComplianceWithSpecificLegalProvisionsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnNoExistenceCovU11_AccuracyAndCompletenessOfTheHomeAllocation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AccuracyAndCompletenessOfTheHomeAllocation` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `AgreementsConcludedWithThirdParties` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AccountabilityComplianceWithSpecificLegalProvisionsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnExistenceCovU11_AgreementsConcludedWithThirdParties')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AccountabilityComplianceWithSpecificLegalProvisionsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ValueThnExistenceCovU11_AgreementsConcludedWithThirdParties return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DerivativeTransactions` MUST exist at least once.
